reviewText:
I bought one of these from DreamCricket through Amazon. The back cover of the DVD says there are 3 discs inside, where 2 of the discs are the 438 game.

However, this only contains footage and commentary of the series as a whole. The actual game is NOT included in this DVD.

I bought this for my wife. She is from South Africa and loves cricket.  The DVD is more of snapshots and commentary of the game rather than the actual playing of the game.  Still, she said it was good.

438- The Greatest One Day Game 2006

This is supposed to be a 3 DVD set but only had 1 DVD in the box.

Amazon did refund me.
